mapper.select: SELECT * FROM etop_floor_room as efr, etop_floor as ef, etop_park as ep WHERE efr.ref_floor_id=ef.id AND ef.park_id=ep.id AND ep.id=#{id} GROUP BY efr.room_num
SELECT * FROM etop_floor_room as efr, etop_floor as ef, etop_park as ep WHERE efr.ref_floor_id=ef.id AND ef.park_id=ep.id AND efr.ref_floor_id=#{refFloorId}
SELECT * FROM etop_floor_room WHERE ref_area_id=#{refAreaId} GROUP BY room_num
SELECT room_img FROM etop_floor_room WHERE id=#{roomid}
